```{r}
D1<-HMXPC13_DI_v2_5_14_14
```

```{r}
sum(with(D1, course_id=="HarvardX/CS50x/2012" & certified==1))
```
```{r}
sum(with(D1, course_id=="HarvardX/CS50x/2012" & start_time_DI=="2012-10-15" & registered==1))
```
```{r}
D1.5<-filter(D1, final_cc_cname_DI=="United States")
D1.5
```

```{r}
D2<-select(D1.5, userid_DI , start_time_DI)
D2
```
```{r}
D2.5<-select(D1, userid_DI, registered, start_time_DI)
D2.5
```
```{r}
D2.5 = mutate(D2.5, row = row_number())
D2.5
```
```{r}
D2.5$value <- 1
D2.5
```

```{r}
D3<-spread(D2.5,start_time_DI,value)
```

```{r}
colnames(D3)[colnames(D3) == 'row'] <- 'student_id'
```

```{r}
D4 <- subset(D3, select = -c(1))
```

```{r}
M1<-data.matrix(D4, rownames.force = NA)
```

```{r}
M2<-t(D4)
```

```{r}
M3<-M1 %*% M2
```

```{r}
diag(M3)<-NA
```
